title: Walking Dead S:5 | E:13 Forget | Slate TV Club
description:
Mike Vuolo and Chris Wade recap Episode 13 of The Walking Dead, “Forget.”
 
Mike is the host ofSlate's Lexicon Valley podcast and a senior producer forSlatepodcasts, and Chris is a producer for theSlate Video team.
 
Slate Plus members can download Slate’s Walking Dead podcast immediately following the broadcast of new episodes on AMC. To learn more and to try Slate Plus free for two weeks, visit: Slate.com/DeadPlus
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
